articles.title: Digital Services Tax hits tech startups and content creators
articles.description: Digital Services Tax hits tech startups and content creators. Digital Services Tax continues to dominate Kenyan policy discourse as stakeholders weigh in on the implications for ordinary citizens.
articles.content: Digital Services Tax hits tech startups and content creators. The Digital Services Tax has been a subject of intense debate across Kenya. Analysts say the policy will have significant implications for the digital sector. Various stakeholders including civil society groups, business associations, and county governments have expressed diverse opinions on the matter.
